Articles.Content:
Here's my second, and more ambitious, animated short. The goal was to tell a little story (based on a well known gameplay situation) without texts or audible dialogues.

It's still made with Illustrator and After Effect.

Hope you'll like it

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/71xrhQ-XjCU?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

The cast from left to right:

Bob, Jeb, Valentina, Kevin and Jean-Paul.

![9eYW48Pl.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/9eYW48Pl.jpg)
I'm sure this will be in Fanwork Friday. I have never seen better KSP animation.

\*claps\* That's so accurate. Jeb's been on the Mun for 200+ days in my career mode. He sneaked into the first Mun-Base Module that was supposed to be unmanned. I sent another kerbal out so he has someone to talk to, but otherwise I'm not sending anything else to the Mun Base in progress until I unlock bigger rover wheels.
Impressive work! Beautiful in it's simplicity, and the situation is all too familiar.

Amazing.

Have this.

![CwP3hvA.png](http://i.imgur.com/CwP3hvA.png)

Although I have to say, on Valentina's landng (3:03) the terrain looked like Minmus, not the Mun.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-05T02:00:39Z" title="07/05/2015 02:00  AM" data-short="9 yr">July 5, 2015</time> by windows\_x\_seven**

> 
> Although I have to say, on Valentina's landng (3:03) the terrain looked like Minmus, not the Mun.

Well, um, it was. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Love it! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> Well, um, it was. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Uhhhhhh...

guess I should've paid more attention ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

*christ that was embarrasing*
Dude, i love it! have a rep!
OMG! Its all about us! Amazing!
So, so true ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) We've all been there (or done worse things). Great animation and story.

Holy awesome!! This must have taken you a good bit of time to put together. Very well done! Of course now as a rabid, entitled, whiny fanboy I have to clamor endlessly for more.....More!!!! ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

\*edit\* Gratz on your well deserved Facebook feature!!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-10T13:55:31Z" title="07/10/2015 01:55  PM" data-short="9 yr">July 10, 2015</time> by esinohio**

7000 views! Thank you everybody! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I don't know what will come next, I'm still searching for an idea, but for now, vacations! ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)
Fantastic work! SQUAD, you MUST make low-grav capsule beachball animations stock RIGHT NOW!
